solution_line_template: The hotel has in total {num_floors} floors * {rooms_per_floor} rooms/floor = <<{num_floors}*{rooms_per_floor}={total_rooms}>>{total_rooms} rooms.
One floor is unavailable, so Hans could be checked into {total_rooms} rooms - {unavailable_floors}0 rooms = <<{total_rooms}-{unavailable_floors}0={available_rooms}>>{available_rooms} available rooms.
